params.accessToken: BMN / access token used by escrows (kept for backward compat)

postInteraction((uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Decodes extension data and creates source escrow

params.orderHash: The hash of the filled order

addressOfEscrow((bytes32,bytes32,uint256.notice: Get escrow address for given parameters

isWhitelistedResolver(address).notice: Compatibility method for resolver checks from escrows

postInteraction((uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Called by SimpleLimitOrderProtocol after order fill
